hsg-desc: Extension description shown on Special:Version. Summarise that HighslideGallery provides Highslide-powered galleries for images and YouTube, offers thumbnails or inline links, supports slideshow grouping via hsgid, keeps captions in the overlay, and includes both legacy <hsyoutube> tag and modern parser functions.
hsgimg-desc: Description for parser function {{#hsgimg:}}. Used on Special:Version and in localisation; describes that it renders Highslide-enabled images (thumb or inline) and can join a slideshow group via hsgid.
hsgytb-desc: Description for parser function {{#hsgytb:}}. Used on Special:Version and in localisation; describes that it renders Highslide-enabled YouTube videos (thumb or inline) and can join a slideshow group via hsgid.
hsg-hover-instructions: Tooltip text shown by Highslide when hovering over images in the overlay. Explains dragging and keyboard shortcuts (arrows, space, f, Esc) for manipulating the HSG. Used by JS module ext.highslideGallery.
hsg-loading-text: Status text shown while media loads.
hsg-loading-title: Tooltip on the loading indicator; usually explains you can click to cancel.
hsg-focus-title: Tooltip hint for bringing the expander to the front.
hsg-full-expand-title: Tooltip for the zoom toggle control; reflects the fit/zoom behavior (f key).
hsg-previous-title: Tooltip for the Previous control (and keyboard arrow left).
hsg-next-title: Tooltip for the Next control (and keyboard arrow right).
hsg-number: Caption string for the member counter; placeholders %1 and %2 are current index and total.
